title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: After pressing Ok, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as separate operations. By setting the output location first, it creates an illegal state.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location.  2. Go to the project properties and change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
